pcap.dev.desc: specify the network device which pcap should listen to

pcap.promiscuous.desc: specify if the pcap works on promiscuous mode. 0:no; 1:yes

pcap.file.pre.desc: specify the dumped file's directory and the prefix.

echo.c.addr.desc: specify the address which the protocol will connect to

echo.c.port.desc: specify the port which the protocol will connect to

echo.c.rpower.desc: specify the receive buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

echo.c.wpower.desc: specify the write buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

echo.s.addr.desc: specify the address which the protocol will listen to

echo.s.port.desc: specify the port which the protocol will listen to

echo.s.rpower.desc: specify the receive buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

echo.s.wpower.desc: specify the write buffer size: power(2, echo.rpower).

echo.s.hbi.desc: specify the seconds of connection's Heartbeat Interval.

echo.s.hbm.desc: specify the max times of connection's Heartbeat Timeout.

cmd.s.addr.desc: specify the address which the protocol will listen to

cmd.s.port.desc: specify the port which the protocol will listen to

prc.netTno.desc: specify the thread number for Net Processor/ThreadPool

prc.fsmTno.desc: specify the thread number for Fsm Processor/ThreadPool

prc.ioTno.desc: specify the thread number for I/O Processor/ThreadPool

log.pattern.desc: specify how to log a message. please refer to log4plus' manual.

log.filename.desc: specify the file which will be logged to

log.fileSize.desc: specify the max size(MB) for a single file.

log.fileNum.desc: specify the max file number which the log files should keep.
